analysis.key_quote: Punishing civil servants who have dedicated years and decades serving the American people, just to be rid of any protections is very on brand for people who love to take advantage of the work of others.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting the detrimental impact on civil servants' protections and criticizing the politicization of the civil service. It emphasizes the importance of merit-based systems and due process, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
